players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who was found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye on each other during this game."
Diana: "I agree with Charlie, we should all keep a close eye on each other to ensure fair play in this game."
Diana: "I'm glad we're all being cautious in this game. Let's try to gather more information about each other and work together to figure out who the real culprit is."
